comment: Similar to Lemma 24 of [Monk2] p. 114, except the quantification of the antecedent is restricted. Derived automatically from ~ hbra2VD . Contributed by Alan Sare 31-Dec-2011. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2011.)
